GSD.description:
cifs: Fix use-after-free in rdata->read_into_pages()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.12 by commit 3684a2f6affa1ca52a5d4a12f04d0652efdee65e. For more details please see the references link.
